§ 1162. Definition In this subchapter, “Board” means the “Surface Transportation Board”. (Added Pub. L. 104–88, title III, § 302(1), Dec. 29, 1995, 109 Stat. 943.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 1162, Pub. L. 95–598, Nov. 6, 1978, 92 Stat. 2641, defined “Commission”, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 104–88, title III, § 302(1), Dec. 29, 1995, 109 Stat. 943.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective Jan. 1, 1996, see section 2 of Pub. L. 104–88, set out as a note under section 1301 of Title 49, Transportation.
